revised_title: Innovations and Future Trends in Building Materials and Technology
tldr: The article discusses the advancements in building materials and technology in the 1980s, highlighting the contributions of materials scientists. It explores the shift from traditional materials to modern innovations, such as concrete, glass technology, metals, plastics, and surface coatings. The author also emphasizes the importance of performance specifications and materials science in driving future progress in the construction industry.
